Like, what would be helpful, what to do about it? I used this approach that looks at problems in two main categories. The problems are sort of solutions. So the first category are the -- those that you can -- where you can decrease your stress level by taking some action, it could be changing something in your environment, it could be changing your behavior like learning some new communication skills, conflict resolution or a certain skills that help you in your -- decrease stress in your relationships, it could be self-care activities like not just physical but emotional spiritual self-care kinds of things, it can be increasing your social support, so it can be a variety of things in that domain and help people figure out what would be small steps you could take, actions that would get you going on the right path.
